string-array.name: descriptions
string-array.item: NaNa inspired Vega Cap. \nIncluding stainless steel decorative chains and accessories which are detachable. \nFabric Detail-Leather and polyester
Vivienne Westwood Inspired Striped Shirt \nStainless Steel Buttons \nFabric Detail- 100% Cotton

Versace-Inspired fold and crease skirt.\nFabric Detail-Made with Silk Crepe De Chine to give the skirt more crinkled texture and let it drape the curves well. Additionally, draping waist accessory is stainless-steel to make the skirt more elegant.
Ivory-Colored Blouse with slightly drape waist.\nFabric Detail-Made with Cotton Sateen to give the blouse more structural wrinkle, and elegant and polished look.
Burgundy-colored HeavyWeight Vest, with zipper behind the back.\nFabric Detail-Made with wool crepe togive the vest more matte look and warmth.
Vega Cap without any accessories.\nFabric Detail-Top Flat made with wool and cap tongue is made with leather.
Peter Do SS20 combo suit inspired coat jacket.\nFabric Detail-Faux leather and cotton underneath to give the jacket heavyweight and luxury touch.
